project.name: xuggle-buildhelper
project.description:
This build file is a generic build file meant to be imported by other builds. It has the standard rules used by the Yard build system.
Callers must define the following properites BEFORE importing:
library.version.major: An integer less than 65536 library.version.minor: An integer less than 256 (don't ask).
